headlines.description: Goals from Olivier Giroud and Marcos Alonso either side of half time earned Chelsea a crucial 2-1 victory over top-four rivals Tottenham.

headlines.shortLinkText: Prem admit VAR error as Chelsea beat Spurs

headlines.description: Burnley moved up to eighth in the Premier League with a 3-0 win over struggling Bournemouth in a game which saw a dramatic turnaround due to VAR.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley beat Bournemouth 3-0 amid VAR drama

headlines.description: Crystal Palace broke a three-match losing streak in the Premier League with a 1-0 win over Newcastle.
headlines.shortLinkText: Van Aanholt thunderbolt against Newcastle gives Palace win

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Sheffield United

headlines.description: A poacher's goal from Neal Maupay cancelled out a peach of a strike from Enda Stevens as Sheffield United drew 1-1 with Brighton & Hove Albion.
headlines.shortLinkText: Maupay seals draw for Brighton at Sheffield United

headlines.description: Southampton continued their surge from the Premier League's bottom half towards mid-table with a 2-0 home win over Aston Villa on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Long and Armstrong give Southampton win over Villa

video.headline: Southampton back on track as Villa's struggles continue

headlines.description: Gabriel Jesus scored a late winner as Manchester City edged Leicester to a 1-0 win in the Premier League on Saturday.
